title: Jack 'O Lantern Launcher
summaries: The Jack 'O Lantern Launcher is a Hardmode, post-Plantera launcher that fires Explosive Jack 'O Lanterns which ricochet off blocks before exploding upon contact with an enemy or after approximately 7 seconds, or 420 ticks. Explosive Jack 'O Lanterns are always dropped alongside the weapon in an amount ranging from 25 to 50. Explosive Jack 'O Lanterns can also be bought from the Arms Dealer for 15 CC each if they have the Jack 'O Lantern Launcher in their inventory.

The Jack 'O Lantern Launcher has a base 10% critical strike chance as opposed to the usual 4%. The Jack 'O Lantern Launcher is dropped by the <linked>Pumpking</linked> during the <linked>Pumpkin Moon</linked> <linked>event</linked> with a 1.56 ~ 12.5% (<linked>6.25 ~ 12.5%</linked>) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Damage: 65 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 60 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Ranged)
statistics.Use time: 25 (Fast) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 30 (Average) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
